title: Add blank layout on dashboard
body: In dashboard there is no option to create page from blank. Please add blank option

title: New Layouts
body: More layout to start with

title: Adding google tag manager
body:
I have seen that you offer an option to add google analytics.
But mostly i want to use the google tag manager which needs one entry in the header and another one directly after the "body" tag. Would it be possible to add an second field after the body tag? Or is it possible to modify the template file by my own?

title: How to change the tinymce toolbar in onepager editor
body: How can i change te buttons in the toolbar of the WYSIWYG editor like the normal page editor (installed advance tinymce)

title: Is possible to export blocks?
body: I tried exporting a wordpress site to another, but onegager does not work and it portrays me a clean project to recreate .. where are all my blocks?

title: can we use it without wordpress or joomla ?
body:
I am trying to use it's custom code . I don't want wordpress or joomal . How can i use it ?

Thanks

title: How to add new iconset on icon picker?
body: How do i add new icon set for icon picker field? i have seen the icon-selector script and can't see a hook for adding new icon set.

title: Is onepager still being developed?
body: I've only just stumbled across onepager. Is it still being developed? I can see the most recent commit is 5 months ago and that issues aren't being replied to by the team. It was interesting to read the 2.0 milestones but it doesn't seem to have come to fruition.

title: Slider no responsive in smartphones
body:
Hello.
Problems with the slider in smartphones (Android and Windows Phone).
Screenshots:
![wp_ss_20160411_0002](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/18409401/14446603/5438c88a-002e-11e6-8afe-556de3c06e32.png)
![wp_ss_20160411_0003](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/18409401/14446604/54587676-002e-11e6-99df-dae3a07e76e4.png)

Any suggestions?
regards

title: Github version not the same as download on wordpress
body:
I cant get this version to work. I get an error when activating the plugin

Warning: require(/plugins/onepager/vendor/autoload.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /plugins/onepager/tx-onepager.php on line 49

No vendor folder in this repo. 

I downloaded the version on:

https://wordpress.org/plugins/tx-onepager/

This one works fine.

title: Onepage Editor keeps enabling sticky navs automatically
body: I have several blocks with the same menu but I want only one to be a sticky nav. Every time I open the Onepage Editor it automatically enables all of them, even though I chose "sticky navs: disabled" for most.

title: Do not show title in browser title bar
body:
I create a onepager theme http://bddevteam.com/portfolio/
but, here is not show title in browser bar. title tag include function.php. why do not show title?

title: Any way to add dynamic content from posts?
body:
Would be nice if there was a content block to add content pulling from posts. Would be a loop block of sorts.

Is this planned? I could do this myself but thought I would ask if it is possible first and some rough direction.

title: Request Feature  - slider numeric value
body: i think would be great if onepager have slider numeric value :)

title: URL link in the text box or support for html code
body: I would like to be able to add url link in the text box of Content blocks.

title: ColorPalette confusing after picking color presets
Global settings color change causing mapping problem
body:
How to reproduce
1. Select a preset for a page
2. Change global color primary, it will work fine and change all primary color
3. Save
4. Go back to the page and again select previous preset
5. Now change global color primary coping the existing preset primary color

You will get the error.

title: Multisite installation
body:
Only the super-admin can edit Onepage Settings on a Multisite installation. 
(Maybe: https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/28451)

title: A fair few questions about One Pager
body:
Hi,

 Thanks for releasing this, it is brilliant.

I just have a couple of questions about it.
1. Does it support Multisite?
2. Does it support custom post types?
3. Can you save templates for use again?
4. Is it compatible with WPML / qTranslate?
5. Is it woocommerce compatible?
6. Does it have parallax?
7. Is it easily extendable to create new blocks / features etc...?
8. Would i be able to use this in my theme?
   9 Could i easily include my own template structure like Bootstrap 4 or https://github.com/corysimmons/lost <-- which im currently using.
9. Can i use it to build multiple pages?
10. Would be easy to create rows / grids using Bootstrap 4 or Lost instead of yours?
11. Can you explain how you put the block / fields content into the current page?
12. How would i go about embedding the plugin into the from a custom plugin?
13. Im using Kirki Live Customizer could these both intergrate?
14. if i install the plugin will all of my written content still be there or will it have gone or left shortcodes?
15. Can you integrate things like Contact Form 7 form / Gravity form etc...?

I've just had alot of questions from peers about this amazing plugin, im pretty new to this plugin but i will be getting stuck into it the next couple of days.

if you need any help let me know.

Thanks Jake.

title: Responsive alignment
body:
Hello OnePager team,

After the previous update maybe I have a second improvement option.

Most of functions on a onepage-page are perfectly responsive on small screen devices. There is only one option that can be more fine I suppose. The "Portfolio" and "Team" images are left aligned on small devices and not centered. Besides all the other images like "Features" and "Sliders" are centered aligned and that's looks better in my opinion.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/tx-onepager/

title: How to Use GoogleFont Plugin with OnePager
body: Yes, How can I use a plugin like googlefont to help with changing the fonts on OnePager ?

title: Need to be able to add default favicon.
body:
It's a nice feature that you've already implemented the favicon (from "General Settings".) Whenever someone uploads an image, it shows up as favicon. However, there's currently no way of adding a default favicon, which will be shown whenever the theme is activated. 

Hard coding the favicon isn't helping.
